title: Jaya Ballard, Task Mage
text: , , Discard a card: Destroy target blue permanent., , Discard a card: Jaya Ballard, Task Mage deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn., , Discard a card: Jaya Ballard deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
expansion: Premium Deck Series: Fire and Lightning
